metadata.description: A sinister organization is sending its bio-robots, or cyboks, to wreak havoc worldwide.  All that stands in their way is M.O.B.I.L.E., a global security organization whose agents can call upon the skills of experts in any field they need, thanks to the miracle of the Mindmerge.  But the tech's limitations make it dangerously incompatible for anyone too far past adolescence, so the fate of the world rests in the hands of willing but inexperienced teens!
metadata.name: Team M.O.B.I.L.E.
